properties.name: Banff National Park
properties.description: Canada's first national park with turquoise glacial lakes and Rocky Mountain peaks

properties.name: Lake Louise
properties.description: Iconic turquoise glacier-fed lake surrounded by snow-capped peaks and Chateau Fairmont

properties.name: Moraine Lake
properties.description: Stunning teal glacial lake in the Valley of the Ten Peaks, often preferred over Lake Louise

properties.name: Niagara Falls (Canadian side)
properties.description: Best views of the thundering Horseshoe Falls dumping 3,160 tons of water per second

properties.name: Jasper National Park
properties.description: Canada's largest Rocky Mountain park with world-class dark sky stargazing

properties.name: Icefields Parkway
properties.description: 144-mile scenic drive between Banff and Jasper with over 100 visible glaciers

properties.name: Gros Morne National Park
properties.description: UNESCO site showcasing continental drift with granite mountains and freshwater fjords

properties.name: Yoho National Park
properties.description: Home to Takakkaw Falls, one of Canada's tallest waterfall systems at 833 feet

properties.name: Athabasca Glacier
properties.description: One of the most accessible glaciers in North America on the Columbia Icefield

properties.name: Cape Breton Highlands
properties.description: Famous Cabot Trail scenic drive through boreal forest and dramatic coastline
